name: Flower Trip
description:
Created for the 7dfps game jam! This was a collab between NOTH (Alex and Oscar) and Michael and Max! We had 7 days but only did it in 2!

Oscar- Tech, Game designer
Alex- Concept, 2D art/animation, Sound
Max - 3D artist, Setdressing
Michael- 3D artist, Setdressing

Controls:

w/a/s/d:          move
spacebar:      jump - double jump
L click:            fire
shift:                slide
